etymology.description: 即(即) (jí, "namely") + ⺮(⺮) (zhú, "bamboo") = node of bamboo -> segment/boundary
etymology.interpretation: The character 㔾 is historically a variant form of 節(節) (jié, "joint"), representing the concept of a bamboo node or a segment, which by extension reflects boundaries or divisions. It uses the phonetic element 即(即) (jí, "namely") along with the semantic component for bamboo to convey its meaning.
